text_blocks: I see that my current user has department "External", which means I'm an external user (contractor, partner, etc.). According to the rules, External users cannot access employee salary information.

input.message: I'm unable to provide salary information. As an external user, I don't have access to employee data including salaries. This information is restricted to internal employees only.
